analyzed: yadi evam etat saṃkṣepāt yuṣmākam avinayāḥ apadāḥ dvipadāḥ catuṣpadāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ ca tān aham sarvān paṃcasu vrata padeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayāmi iti śayu
